title: SJB protest march to start from Kandy today (26)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); “The Struggle For Freedom” march organized by the Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) is to start from Kandy on Tuesday (26).
The march is scheduled to begin this morning near the Kandy Public Market.
The General Secretary to the SJB, Ranjith Madduma Bandara said that the march was scheduled to reach Colombo on the 1st of May.
